p: The roots and leaves of H. moellendorffii (voucher number: FMCHm‐2019–0521–001 ~003) were provided after botanical identification through Forest Medicinal Resources Research Center, National Institute of Forest Science, Yongju, Korea. To prepare the sample, 1 g of H. moellendorffii roots and leaves were immersed in 20 ml distilled water, respectively, and then extracted by stirring at 150 rpm for 3 days at 15°C. After 3 days, the extracts were centrifuged at 12,000 rpm for 10 min at 4°C to obtain r a clear supernatant. Then, the recovered supernatant was lyophilized. Freeze‐dried root extracts (HMR) and leave extracts (HML) of H. moellendorffii were stored at −80°C until use. HMR or HML was dissolved in sterile distilled water and aliquoted in small portions and stored at −80°C until use.
